text: I I direct my Executor, [Person-2], to pay all my just debts and all funeral expenses, including the exhumation of my husband, [Person-3]' remains and be reburied by me at Antioch Cemetery.

texts: to pay all my just debts and all funeral expenses, including the exhumation of my husband, [Person-3]' remains and be reburied by me at Antioch Cemetery
all funeral expenses, including the exhumation of my husband, [Person-3]' remains and be reburied by me at Antioch Cemetery
